document_data.mainbody:
Velgor Zolond was a drow mage in Menzoberranzan in the late 15 century DR.
Circa 1486 DR, Velgor was the second-in-command of Ryzliir Symryvvin in leading a drow battalion to intercept an expedition led by some adventurers, whod been hired by Bruenor Battlehammer to investigate the threat of a demon lord, but she and her troops were defeated.
Velgor was the husband and the second-in-command of Ryzliir Symryvvin.
